parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the loss of braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels hard or spongy
the brakes are unable to stop the vehicle
the vehicle pulls to one side when braking
the brake warning light is illuminated
the ABS system is replaced multiple times
and the master cylinder is replaced repeatedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the loss of braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels hard or spongy
the brakes are unable to stop the vehicle
the master cylinder is replaced multiple times
and the ABS system is replaced repeatedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hydraulic servo can cause the loss of braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels hard or spongy
the brakes are unable to stop the vehicle
and the hydraulic servo is replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the convertible top fasteners can cause the top to fly off while driving, resulting in damage to the vehicle and potential injury to occupants or other road users.
symptoms: The convertible top blows back or flies off while driving
the jack screws or fasteners disengage from the body of the vehicle
the convertible top is loose or unstable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Bosch braking system can cause the brakes to fail completely, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden and unexpected loss of braking ability
inability to stop the vehicle
brake failure while driving
increased stopping distance
or complete brake failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Relay Failure in Bosch Braking System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the relay in the Bosch braking system can cause the brakes to malfunction or fail completely, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden and unexpected loss of braking ability
inability to stop the vehicle
brake failure while driving
increased stopping distance
or complete brake failure.
